queryMapper.query: INSERT INTO LOGON_TRACKER (USER_ID, USER_TYPE, LOGIN_TIME_MILLIS, LOGIN_FROM, MACHINE_IP) VALUES (:userId, :userType, :loginTimeMillis, :loginFrom, :machineIp)

SELECT LT.*, CASE WHEN USER_TYPE = 'Employee' THEN IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM EMPLOYEE E WHERE E.USER_ID = LT.USER_ID), LT.USER_ID) WHEN USER_TYPE = 'Tutor' THEN IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM REGISTERED_TUTOR R WHERE R.USER_ID = LT.USER_ID), LT.USER_ID) WHEN USER_TYPE = 'Customer' THEN IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM SUBSCRIBED_CUSTOMER S WHERE S.USER_ID = LT.USER_ID), LT.USER_ID) ELSE LT.USER_ID END AS USER_NAME FROM LOGON_TRACKER LT

INSERT INTO PASSWORD_CHANGE_TRACKER (USER_ID, USER_TYPE, CHANGE_TIME_MILLIS, ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_OLD, ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_NEW) VALUES (:userId, :userType, :changeTimeMillis, :encryptedPasswordOld, :encryptedPasswordNew)
